translate.english: heard of sb. for a long time

examples.example: 今日终于见到您，真是久仰大名，我非常开心能与您相识。

translate.english: Finally seeing you today, I've long heard of your great name, and I am very happy to get to know you.

examples.example: 幸会，早就听闻您的事迹，今日得见，果真是久仰大名啊！

translate.english: Nice to meet you. I have heard of your deeds long ago. Seeing you today, it really is a great admiration for a long time!

examples.example: 久仰大名了，今日能够与您合作真是我的荣幸。

translate.english: I've long heard of your great name, and it's really my honor to be able to cooperate with you today.
